JobTitle: Manager, Technical Program Management – Business Process & Technology, Products
JobFullDesc: The Business Technology & Process team builds products & tools to support every single person selling ads or supporting customers at Facebook. We are the backbone of the business, and our goal is to be the growth driver for the company. We develop the platform, infrastructure, and tools that run the business, and we optimize for the long-term success of our partners and customers. We’re seeking an experienced Manager for our Technical Program Management Team (TPM), who is used to supporting multiple product engineering teams and various stakeholders. This is a global role and the TPM Manager will be partnering closely with our product and engineering teams to ensure we’re building the right data systems, infrastructure, and solutions for our sales and support teams internally, as well as providing guidance on how to prioritize and make tradeoffs against the needs of the business. The TPM Manager will work directly with engineers and also influence other product team leadership to ensure we have the right vision and alignment across the business.Shape product direction & strategy for our customer support efforts and other top priority initiatives while also managing the growth and success of a talented TPM team.Set clear goals, manage project loads and allocate TPMs accordingly.
